info.title: Schema of Container Service events published to Azure Event Grid via Azure Resource Notifications
info.description: Describes the schema of the Container Service events published to Azure Event Grid. This corresponds to the Data property of an EventGridEvent.

ResourceNotificationsContainerServiceEve.description: Schema of the Data property of an event grid event for a Microsoft.ResourceNotifications.ContainerServiceEventResources.ScheduledEventEmitted preview event.
